title: Ackermann Lucky to Escape Serious Injury After Crashing on Speed Bump in Final Sprint
content:
The German sprinter lost control as he struck a raised pedestrian crossing within sight of the finish line in the latest incident of safety measures falling short in early season racing.

Read the full article at Ackermann Lucky to Escape Serious Injury After Crashing on Speed Bump in Final Sprint on Velo.
author: ahood
